Plot: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.
Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Actors: Will Smith, Matt Damon, Charlize Theron, Bruce McGill
tomatoConsensus: Despite the talent involved in The Legend of Bagger Vance, performances are hindered by an inadequate screenplay full of flat characters and bad dialogue. Also, not much happens, and some critics are offended by how the film glosses over issues of racism.
